title: So I just got disconnected and unable to reconnect to the game, even though I have internet connecti
body:
Everything working just fine, interenet connection is stable, but cannot reconnect to the game. Exited the client, tried to reconnect again and I'm getting error that I'm unable to reconnect. Any help?

Sorry for the broken title, too little characters available.

replies.body: Got DC at 2 min of game. Can't reconnect, same as 3 ppl from this game. Its 1.5h later, "reconnect" window still exist. Game should end long ago. Cant play. help?
Same here, i have been stuck in the " reconnect " window. I tried to restart the router and game but it was useless...
That pretty shitty that  I can't play. Thats little unfair. Im getting angry, and it is not what are games for.
Me and my gf have been waiting for ages, stuck in "reconnect" window. Im actually getting anoyed by this server  ...
I have the same problem... and I am still in game I can't do nothing :( I was playing custom game with friend.

Hey are you still having this issue?  EU had some issues earlier with logging in but should be resolved.  If your issue is specifically getting back into game then your ISP or local network might be having problems reaching the game server.  The steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help in this case.
